chatgpt_plus.monthly_limit: Limited usage on GPT-4o; up to 5x more messages than free tier. Higher limits during peak-traffic hours.

claude_pro.monthly_limit: 5x more usage than the free tier. Higher usage limits for Claude 3.5 Sonnet, Opus, and Haiku.
5x more usage than the free tier. Higher usage limits for Claude 3.5 Sonnet, Opus, and Haiku.

gemini_advanced.monthly_limit: Access to Gemini 1.5 Pro and 1.5 Flash via web interface. No explicit token limits for subscribers.
Access to Gemini 1.5 Pro and 1.5 Flash via web interface. No explicit token limits for subscribers.

llama_3.hosting_cost: Variable (depends on cloud provider, e.g., AWS, GCP, Azure)

copilot_pro.features: Priority access to latest models (GPT-4 Turbo), enhanced AI image creation, Copilot in Microsoft 365 apps.

copilot_for_microsoft_365.features: Everything in Copilot Pro, plus enterprise-grade data protection, Microsoft Graph integration, and custom copilot building.

pricing_analysis.subscription_adoption_rate: High and growing, driven by $20/month standard set by OpenAI and Anthropic.
pricing_analysis.trend: Aggressive price wars among top-tier models, driving down costs for high-quality intelligence. Previous-generation models are being heavily discounted. Open-source models like Llama 3 and low-cost API providers like DeepSeek and Groq are commoditizing the lower end of the market, forcing incumbents to compete on price and bundle services into subscriptions.
